module.name: Dial Plan Vizualizer
module.description: Graphical display of the dial plan for any Inbound Route
module.changelog: *1.0.15* Moved module to dpviz *1.0.14* Updated for ANY route. Updated for E.164 format. Added Highlighting. *1.0.13* Formatted module. Added Dynamic Routes. Big overhaul of code. *1.0.12* Added panzoom *1.0.11* Updated name and email for Voicemail *1.0.10* AdamV forked from abqcheeks/cpviz *1.0.8* First fully working release *1.0.0* First release, testing module creation
